title: 1901 Boston Time Capsule Provides A Lesson In Curating History
teaser: Audie Cornish talks to Brian LeMay, president of the Bostonian Society, about opening a 113-year-old time capsule that was found inside a wooden lion sculpture atop the historic state house.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
